pros: Many owners use Edison bulbs to complete the retro feel
Will last through any season and weather
Includes light kit and remote control
cons: Some report that it was difficult to install

customer_reviews.title: Perfect industrial looking fan .
customer_reviews.text: I just love this fan/light! My decor is rustic industrial and I have this in my bedroom and it makes a statement. I have a lot of galvanized decor and this just tops the cake. The fan runs smooth and quiet. The remote works perfect. I have nothing Negative to say. Its a large fan, most people would never use this inside, but I like to think out of the box and glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbytanner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and love the look! Bought two for our living room. The light is just right in or opinion, but it isn't a bright white, just a soft glow. Any 60W LED will work if you wanted to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Casey J. Staidl

customer_reviews.title: This fan is awesome! I ordered 2 for a rental property and ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome! I ordered 2 for a rental property and they look great. It is galvanized metal and has a rustic look. I used them for indoor rooms but they are for outdoor use as well. The electrician commented on the quality and easy installation. I liked them so much I ordered another for my house. Both times they arrived very quick and no problems with packaging.

customer_reviews.title: Id buy another
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice look, easy install. Remote is very cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than year of very limited use
customer_reviews.text: The fan and light were installed at my cabin located in northern MN in July of 2017 since the cabin is only used 6 months per year and the fan a few time during that 6 months I am saying it is less than a years worth of use. Both the light and fan flicker on and off . I have tried to contact Contemporary LW several time but no response. I have several other fans and lights that are close to 20 years old and still work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Reilly Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like white paint splattered on the metal. Doesn’t look like real galvanized steel.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: IT DID NOT WORK HAD TO HAE IT REPAIRED BY ELETRCIAN AND IT WAS NOT CHEAP
customer_reviews.author: DAVID HENHOEFFER

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! We didn't have room for the remote box ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! We didn't have room for the remote box in the setup near the ceiling so we just have one speed from our wall switch but that's ok. Looks great with our galvanized wall light on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Fan worked for 1 day and hasn't worked since, company sent part to fix but still didn't work
customer_reviews.author: PAM PRINCE

customer_reviews.title: Great fan. However
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. However, I did end up sending it back. The lights are HUGE. Hard to tell from the photo, but the light hangs down about a foot which was too low for our porch.
customer_reviews.author: Bob - Not My Real Name

customer_reviews.title: They circulate the air well and the light is nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: These fans fit our glassed in porch. They circulate the air well and the light is nice and bright. We have 3 in our porch and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great on my outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Installed quickly with 2 people. Looks and works great on my outdoor patio
customer_reviews.author: M3

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: Every one loves it. It looks great on the screened in porch.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

product_meta.title: Home Decorators Collection Grayton 54 in. Indoor/Outdoor Galvanized Ceiling Fan
product_meta.description: Inside or outside, the Grayton 54 in. Galvanized Ceiling Fan from Home Decorators Collection will impart a classic, bygone look to your aesthetic. The etched seedy glass light fixture, silver blades and metallic motor housing are reminiscent of a warehouse or industrial setting, packaged neatly into a modern fixture with quiet, wobble-free air propulsion. It has three speed settings, reversible rotation and five blades with 14 Degree pitch for superior air movement. A remote control conveniently lets you regulate speeds and illumination from afar. Dimmensions: Assembled Depth (in.): 54.00 in Downrod Length (in.): 4.5 Assembled Height (in.): 21.50 in Fan Blade Length (In.): 25.43 Assembled Width (in.): 54.00 in Fan Blade Width (In.): 5.94 Ceiling Fan Width (in.): 54 Details: Airflow (CFM): 5320 Indoor/Outdoor: Indoor/Outdoor Blade Color Family: Silver Light Type: Globes Bulb Type Included: CFL Motor Speed (RPM): 163 Color Family: Steel Mounting Options: Standard Commercial / Residential: Residential Number of Blades: 5 Damp/Wet Rating: Wet Product Weight (lb.): 27.23 lb Dual Fan Heads: No Pull Chain: No Features: Reversible Motor Remote Control: Yes Fixture Color/Finish: Galvanized Glass Style: Etched Reverse Airflow: Yes Housing Color Family: Silver Reversible Two-Sided Blades: No Included: Downrod, Hardware, Light Kit, Remote Control. Timer: No Certifications and Listings 1-UL Listed
feature_bullets: Award winning modern ceiling fan fixture design and lifetime durability this name brand ceiling fan is made to last a lifetime. This stunning and newly updated fan has even built with more durable materials, quiet motor technology with powerful motor and brilliant led lighting. Equipped with 5 silver blades with 14˚ blade pitch for superb air movement, Includes an integrated light kit with etched seedy glass, Hand held remote control offers 3 speeds with independent light and speed controls

Galvanized finish provides a rustic/retro look indoors or outdoors, Weather-resistant blades and wet-rated housing allow for indoor or outdoor use, Ideal for large rooms up to 20 ft. x 20 ft. with blade sweep of 54 in.

Uses one 14-Watt CFL bulb (included,) Dual-mount installation for standard and sloped ceiling applications, Includes coordinating 4-1/2 in. downrod with 3/4 in. Dia, 172 mm x 20 mm reversible motor offers superior air movement
Includes coordinating 4-1/2 in. downrod with 3/4 in. Dia
172 mm x 20 mm reversible motor offers superior air movement
